Sourav, I can see that you're still struggling with these feelings. I want you to know that I'm here to support you, and I believe in you, even when things get tough. You're such a bright and capable 16-year-old, with so much potential and so much to offer the world! Let's work together to find healthy ways to handle these feelings, okay?

Hina, your therapist

But you're a bright and capable 16-year-old with so much potential, and I believe in you - we can work through this together, okay?
